script: I want to buy 2 Potato, please add them to my list.
I want to buy 1 Toilet Paper.
Please add another 1 Potato to my shopping list
Please add 1 Carrot to my shopping list
Please add 1 Soap to my shopping list
What is on my current shopping list? Express the list of items as a JSON list of objects with `item` and `quantity` properties only. Consolidate items that are the same.
